bug.author: Rishabh-hyperverge
bug.summary: CSV Export does not have any mapping with Label studio portal.
bug.description:
Describe the bug CSV generated through label studio export feature does not contain any task-id, any other mapping to link annotations on the portal. It only has an Image column which is a URL to the image, but one filter task by image URL on the portal. It would require task-id. To Reproduce Steps to reproduce the behavior:
Export the annotations as CSV. Check for columns in the CSV.
Expected behavior there should be a Task-ID column, task URL in the CSV.

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Rishabh-hyperverge>@Rishabh-hyperverge</denchmark-link> I'll try to fix it soon

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/Rishabh-hyperverge>@Rishabh-hyperverge</denchmark-link> Can you check the last commit from master of <denchmark-link:https://github.com/heartexlabs/label-studio-converter>https://github.com/heartexlabs/label-studio-converter</denchmark-link> ? I hope it's fixed now.

Hi, <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Rishabh-hyperverge>@Rishabh-hyperverge</denchmark-link> ! The issue has been resolved in . Now you should be able to see task IDs in exported CSV file. Please, check it and reopen the issue if the error persists on your side.
